title: Seventh Son Of A Seventh Son Remastered
description:
Hello,

this is a remastered Version of Iron Maiden's "Seventh Son Of A Seventh Son" Album from 1988. It was carefully remastered using High Quality Hard- and Software. There's no clipping, no shitty expanders, no brainless EQ distortion. Just pure, powerful, carefully remastered, metal-music. As we know, the original Release lacked in Power and dynamics - I tried hardly to improve your listening experience.

I'm an audiophile High-End HiFi Enthusiast, who tries to make good, old, classic Metal music sound more "real", "modern" and "powerful", without using shitty EQ or any sort of cheap Compressors. 


Give it a try and give me some Feedback if you guys want more audiophile remasters.

Source: CD, slowly ripped with NAIM UnitiServe. NAIM DAC. NAIM Amps. Xavian Speakers. Carbon Cables from Audioquest. Clean, filtered AC.

AIFF, 24 Bit, 1411 kBit/s
Source Files: HDTracks


Have fun and kick ass!
